title: Ragavendra Raja
author: Ragavendra Raja
content: Avalanche coin (AVAX) ranging between $69.08 and $37.13 at the resistance3 and resistance1 levels in the recent past, and then touched $11 support1 level and $19.71 support3 level.AVAX Coin Price Prediction 2022Irrespective of this sideways movement in the price of AVAX, we can deduce the following:AVAX coinâ€™s price is expected to reverse at the $37.13 resistance1 level, due to double top formation. In the event that investors get their way, it could surge higher above the resistance2 level.Resistance1 level reverse will lead to a further decline in the price of AVAX to the support2 level at $11 until a triple bottom is formed. This could lead to a bullish reversal.Nevertheless, we predict a bullish AVAX price prediction for 2022 as psychological resistances may be broken. We can expect Avalanche to reach $120 this year.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Anything is possible if the bitcoin and whole marker would go bullish. Regardless of project, combined efforts every alts or major tokens would definitely reach or even surpass their previous ATH before.I am bullish on avax even though a lot of fud has been spreading about it. Anyway, in a bear scenario, building is one way to survive. Thats why I like avalanche cause they keep building ans never stop improving. One of my major hold and most likely my biggest bag.
